column2: Hell is paved with good intentions--also asbestos.
column3: Hell is paved with good intentions-also asbestos.

column2: In the United States, only Twain.
column3: In the United States, only Twain.

column2: A swift kick for the people.
column3: A swift kick for the people.

column2: Time and tide wait for no man--But time always stands still for a woman of thirty.
column3: Time and tide wait for no man-But time always stands still for a woman of thirty.

column2: Breaking the hair-brush on the disobedient scion, then making him pay for a new one.
column3: Breaking the hair brush on the disobedient scion, then making him pay for a new one.
